The Idea here is the addition of the UNCF ships from the 2199 and 2202 series. However, these two eras would have to be two separate mods instead of one.

Another mod to go with this would be one that transforms kerbin into a desolate planet devoid of oceans like Earth in the first series.

Despite this the ships should have some quirks and differences that make them distinctly kerbal-built ships as well as some lore. mostly to make fun of the design philosophy of the ships and other impracticalities in the designs. Like these were concepts made by some crazy nut in R&D and somehow the board approved and greenlight his proposals into production. Said Nut (Kerbal version of Leiji Matsumoto) also having proposals of converting Steam Trains into spacecraft (Galaxy Express) and Sticking parts of old Sailing ships into starship designs (Captain Harlock/Queen Emeraldas).

Second Mod Comcept: The Gamilas Mod.

 

Context: This is related to the UKCS mod but here, the scenario is Different.

As the result of Kerbin's attempts to search for and make contact with possible intelligent life and prove they we're not alone. The Kerbol System has been subjugated and annexed into the Gamilon Empire. The blame being placed on a friendship message that went mistranslated into something that offended the Gamilons.

 The Kerbin space program now altered to produce Gamilas Ships; Presented here is simply and inventory of the ship classes manufactured by the enslaved Kerbals.

A new launch/landing site would a shipyard similar to this one:

The Mod name is taken from the book, "Battlefield Earth" Where Earth is invaded and subjugated by an alien civilization as a result of their search for intelligent life inviting more hostile powers to the vulnerable Earth.
